name: Jane Austen
biography: Jane Austen was an English novelist known for her six major novels, which interpret, critique, and comment upon the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.

name: Mark Twain
biography: Mark Twain was an American writer, humorist, entrepreneur, and publisher, known for his novels The Adventures of Tom Sawyer and its sequel, Adventures of Huckleberry Finn.

name: J.K. Rowlin
biography: J.K. Rowling is a British author best known for writing the Harry Potter fantasy series, which has gained worldwide popularity and critical acclaim.
